definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: To me masculinity is all my perception, and I think masculinity and feminity is very old-fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 但我认为探讨男性化还是女性化已经过时了。

sentences.english: She is feminine, sensuous and would never take the lead.
sentences.chinese: 她是非常女性化的，性感的，但绝不会主动。

sentences.english: Want proof of the feminization of product design?
sentences.chinese: 想要看到女性化的产品设计吗？
齿痕，下摆是浓情蜜意女性化。

sentences.english: The choice is yours, but be warned it could make you look a little girlish.
sentences.chinese: 你的选择你做主，不过小心它让你看起来有点女性化。

sentences.english: Matte-leather upper with an ultra-feminine collar.
sentences.chinese: 磨砂皮革鞋面超女性化的领。

sentences.english: Trying to be fashionable seems too stereotypically , well, feminine.
sentences.chinese: 时尚的着装似乎总是会和过于女性化划上等号。

sentences.english: But that word, as a name, is quite feminine.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个字作为名字的话，是很女性化的。

sentences.english: In the middle atmosphere romantic and natural, added the feminization elements.
sentences.chinese: 在浪漫与自然的中间氛围中，添加了女性化的要素。

sentences.english: Very often, these mostly all-male bands will attempt to look as feminine as possible (to the point of dressing in drag).
sentences.chinese: 通常这些基本通体男性的乐队会尝试着女性化的造型。

sentences.english: it's a kind of feminized, mincing approach to the novel.
sentences.chinese: 是一种女性化，装腔作势地接近小说。

sentences.english: It's ultra-feminine and brings a touch of mystery to the woman wearing it.
sentences.chinese: 它非常女性化使穿着它的女性具有一种神秘感。

sentences.english: The faces were masculinised and feminised versions of the same features.
sentences.chinese: 每对脸是男性化和女性化版本的同一张脸。

sentences.english: Business schools, those hothouses of capitalism, are feminising fast.
sentences.chinese: 商业学院，资本主义的温室，正在迅速被女性化。

sentences.english: The feminization of agriculture is prevalent in China's rural areas today.
sentences.chinese: 农业女性化是当前农村的一种普遍现象。

sentences.english: I don't think lesbians would like someone as 3feminine as me.
sentences.chinese: 我不认为女同志会喜欢像我这么女性化的人。
